bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ shaped TT for portaging, integrated tapered head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon seat stays, oversized chainstay and carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-330 carbon monocoque w/ tapered steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 745 carbon/alloy, 45mm rims, DT Swiss Revoluion spokes 18/24H, sealed bearing hubs
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia SL Kit Carbonio w/ tubular manganese rails
